## AuthenticatorInterface.authenticate() method

Add authentication information to the specified request.

**Signature:**

```typescript
authenticate(requestOptions: AuthenticateOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  requestOptions | AuthenticateOptions | The request to which authentication information is added (in the headers field). |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
